titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the National Historical Publications and Records Commission for fiscal year 1994 through fiscal year 1999.
An Act to authorize appropriations for the National Historical Publications and Records Commission for fiscal years 1994 and 1995.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1393)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 103-145.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 207.

action.text: Senate incorporated this measure in H.R. 2139 as an amendment.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 2139 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/20/1993--Reported to Senate amended. Extends through FY 1995 the authorization of appropriations for the National Historical Publications and Records Commission.
